doc.name: userModify
doc.summary: Has no effect and is included in LiveCode for compatibility with imported HyperCard stacks.

description.p: In HyperCard, the userModify property determines whether the user can make temporary changes to a locked stack. In LiveCode, this property has no effect.
The userModify property is always set to true. A handler can set it to any value without causing a script error, but the actual value is not changed.
